name: Commodore 64 1581 Disk Image
summary: A D81 file contains a disk image dumped from a 1581 floppy disk for Commodore 64 (C64), a popular personal computer from the 1980s. It stores information about a Commodore 64 game or program in D81 format, organized into 80 tracks holding 40 data sectors each. Various C64 emulators support D81 files, allowing users to run their stored game or program on a modern computer.
